prereq.p:
If it is not possible to start the battery test it could be because:
The system is not in float charge. If this is the case a bar will be visible in orange that links to the Switching operations page.
The test is blocked.

li.p: Press the Main menu icon and navigate to Service > PRIME > Battery tests.
Press the Battery circuit test bar to expand the content if needed.
Press the Start button in line with Battery circuit test to start the test.

result.p: This test does not discharge the battery, it only checks that the battery is correctly connected to the circuit.
If the voltage stays above the set voltage level for the set time, the battery circuit test is successful.
In case the voltage drops below the set voltage level at any time, the test is interrupted and considered unsuccessful.
